MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 20-OCT-2020 17:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the ML12 postcode area of Crawford John. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm to carry out a repair on broken overhead line equipment located at Boghouse John and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.25pm on Tuesday 20th October 2020.
